sentences.en: Al Smith could make anybody laugh.
sentences.cn: 阿尔·史密斯能把所有人逗乐。

sentences.en: Glover thinks that Smith did him down, perhaps out of envy.
sentences.cn: 格洛弗认为史密斯说他坏话，也许是出于嫉妒。

sentences.en: He had had a fight with Smith and bloodied his nose.
sentences.cn: 他和史密斯打了一架，把后者的鼻子打出了血。

sentences.en: He re-ran in his mind his conversation with Smith.
sentences.cn: 他脑子里回顾了一遍他和史密斯的对话。

sentences.en: Joan Smith's detective stories are a cut above the rest.
sentences.cn: 琼·史密斯的侦探小说比其他侦探小说都要出色。

sentences.en: Journalists informed police who planted an undercover detective to trap Smith.
sentences.cn: 记者通知了警方，后者于是为诱捕史密斯而安插了一名卧底侦探。

sentences.en: Mr Smith elbowed me in the face.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生一肘撞在我脸上。

sentences.en: Mr Smith has conditionally agreed to buy a shareholding in the club.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生有条件地同意购买这家俱乐部的股份。

sentences.en: Mr Smith was obstructive and refused to follow correct procedure.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生故意刁难，就是不肯照章办事。

sentences.en: Smith changed his mind and moved back home.
sentences.cn: 史密斯改变主意，搬回家了。

sentences.en: Smith isn't his real name, that stands to reason.
sentences.cn: 很显然，史密斯不是他的真名。

sentences.en: Smith prides himself on being able to organise his own life.
sentences.cn: 史密斯对能够把自己的生活安排得井井有条感到很得意。

sentences.en: Stephen Smith was accepted into the family like an adopted brother.
sentences.cn: 这家人把斯蒂芬·史密斯视为养子一样当作一家人。

sentences.en: Striker Alan Smith was guilty of two glaring misses.
sentences.cn: 前锋艾伦·史密斯两次严重失误，将球射偏。

sentences.en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
sentences.cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

phrases.tran_cn: 绿苹果（澳大利亚的一种青绿色苹果）
保罗·史密斯（人名，英国服饰品牌）
